name: Colors Magic - Save Girl Joy
description:
The girl Joy's village was attacked by a color monster.
You are chosen by fate to the world of color magic, you need to learn the color magic to save the girl!

- Rule
Monsters of all colors are rushing towards you!
Only if your ball is larger than the monster ball and contains the same or more primary colors,
you can kill the monster ball, otherwise you will only escape.
In normal mode when you reach the red line you can pass the level.

- Color magic
Color magic consists of three primary colors, namely red R, green G, blue B.
You can combine different primary colors to create the same number of color balls,
but the more colors you combined, the smaller the combined balls will be.
You can control your combined color balls to move or eat the monster balls.

- Operation method
Slider over the primary colors to combine color balls.
Slide left or right to move your balls.
The color balls combined with different number of colors
moving in different ways, you must remember.

- Level mode
The game has both normal and infinite modes.
There are 8 chapters in the normal mode, including 50 levels.
Chapters include: familiar, rotate, acceleration, color change, left and right, full speed, final, future.
At the beginning of each level, the girl will guide you to continue to move forward, please do not live up to her.

Take action, the doomed warrior, use color magic to save the girl!
